rooms.description: Welcome area leading to the main living space
Spacious living room with Chettinad style decor and traditional carved wood paneling
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen; features a dining table for family meals
Well-equipped kitchen with modern appliances integrated into traditional design
Master bedroom featuring a private balcony and an ensuite bathroom
Secondary bedroom with built-in storage solutions
Third bedroom adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow
Fourth bedroom designed with Chettinad aesthetics and natural lighting considerations

openings.description: Main entrance following traditional architectural norms
Entrance to the servant's quarters ensuring privacy and easy access
